                                                  org.json.JSONObject content,
                                                  int roomId,
                                                  int topicId)
        Helper method to generate custom comment with your defined payload
        Parameters:
        text - default text message for older apps
        type - your custom type
        content - your custom payload
        roomId - room id for these comment
        topicId - topic id for these comment
        Returns:
        QiscusComment
